title: After Sandy: Changes and Choices
content:
Running time: 5 minutes, 20 seconds
For many New Jersey residents and businesses, "resilience" means recovering from storms like last fall's Sandy. Lisa Auermiller with the Jacques Cousteau National Estuarine Research Reserve talks about the factors that spur people to take a longer-term view.
